name: Fall English Breggfast
description:
Programmers

BrieAnna Allen:  https://www.brieallenprogramming.com/

Artists

Alix Newton:  https://alexandranewton.weebly.com/

Kuro Roskowski:  https://www.artstation.com/kuroroskowski

L Tojong:  

Composer

Macy Camille

Sound

Greg Leveninson

Fall English Breggfast is a couch co-cop game you can play with your friend! Battle with your competitor to become Employee of the Month! How do you do that? Simply server the customer faster than your opponent! Catch the food falling from the sky that matches your ingredient list.  Don't grab the wrong food though or you'll have to throw your whole plate away!

Is your co-workers getting slightly ahead of you? Give them a good punch to throw them off their game! 

Whoever serves two customers first gains the title of employee of the month! (No pay raises here though, just prestige!)
